docs.snippet: Argentina and Germany have appeared collectively in nine previous World Cup finals and two against each other. The South Americans beat West Germany to win the 1986 World Cup before the Europeans gained revenge in the final four years later.
docs.lead_paragraph: Argentina and Germany have appeared collectively in nine previous World Cup finals and two against each other. The South Americans beat West Germany to win the 1986 World Cup before the Europeans gained revenge in the final four years later.

headline.main: The Nine Previous Finals Featuring Argentina and Germany
headline.print_headline: The Nine Previous Finals Featuring Argentina and Germany

docs.snippet: Record sums are likely to be wagered in Britain on Sunday's World Cup final between Germany and Argentina, bookmakers said on Friday, illustrating soccer's growing value to the betting industry.
docs.lead_paragraph: Record sums are likely to be wagered in Britain on Sunday's World Cup final between Germany and Argentina, bookmakers said on Friday, illustrating soccer's growing value to the betting industry.

headline.main: Bookmakers Forecast Record Betting in Britain on World Cup Final
headline.print_headline: Bookmakers Forecast Record Betting in Britain on World Cup Final

docs.snippet: Barcelona, who already have Lionel Messi and Neymar up front, will boast an even more fearsome strike force next season after agreeing to buy disgraced Uruguayan Luis Suarez from Liverpool on Friday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Barcelona, who already have Lionel Messi and Neymar up front, will boast an even more fearsome strike force next season after agreeing to buy disgraced Uruguayan Luis Suarez from Liverpool on Friday.

headline.main: Barcelona Bolster Attack With Disgraced Suarez

docs.snippet: Barcelona reached agreement with Liverpool on the transfer of Luis Suarez on Friday, giving the troubled striker a chance to rehabilitate his image when his latest biting ban is over.
docs.lead_paragraph: Barcelona reached agreement with Liverpool on the transfer of Luis Suarez on Friday, giving the troubled striker a chance to rehabilitate his image when his latest biting ban is over.

headline.main: Barcelona Reach Agreement for Luis Suarez
headline.print_headline: Barcelona Reach Agreement for Luis Suarez

docs.snippet: Barcelona announced on Friday that they have agreed to sign disgraced Uruguay striker Luis Suarez from Liverpool.
docs.lead_paragraph: Barcelona announced on Friday that they have agreed to sign disgraced Uruguay striker Luis Suarez from Liverpool.

docs.snippet: - Combining game-changing brilliance with headline-grabbing controversy, striker Luis Suarez joins Barcelona with one foot among the greats and the other planted firmly in football's hall of infamy.
docs.lead_paragraph: - Combining game-changing brilliance with headline-grabbing controversy, striker Luis Suarez joins Barcelona with one foot among the greats and the other planted firmly in football's hall of infamy.

headline.main: Enigma Suarez Driven by Will to Win at All Costs

docs.snippet: Defending champion Carlos Berlocq upset top-seeded David Ferrer in a 6-3, 6-3 victory at the Swedish Open quarterfinals on Friday.

docs.snippet: Four Germans, three Argentines, and one player each from Brazil, Colombia and the Netherlands were short-listed on Friday for the "Golden Ball" award to the World Cup's best player.

docs.snippet: Robin van Persie scored one of the most eye-catching goals of the World Cup with a diving header, and James Rodriguez blasted in one of the tournament's most spectacular after controlling the ball with his chest and volleying home from outside the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Robin van Persie scored one of the most eye-catching goals of the World Cup with a diving header, and James Rodriguez blasted in one of the tournament's most spectacular after controlling the ball with his chest and volleying home from outside the area.
